required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: UPDRS-III Comparisons of DBS for PD Between Patients Receiving MAC and AAA Anesthesia
clinical_study.official_title: UPDRS-III Comparisons of Deep Brain Stimulation for Parkinson's Disease Between Patients Receiving MAC and AAA Anesthesia: a Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: Compares the patients' scores of UPDRS-III before and six-month after receiving deep brain stimulation for Parkinson's disease under MAC or AAA anesthesia.

detailed_description.textblock: Compares the patients' scores of UPDRS-III before and six-month after receiving deep brain stimulation for Parkinson's disease under MAC or AAA anesthesia. Besides, the research also compares the adverse events, LED, dosage of anesthetic drugs, wake-up time, surgical time, Hoehn&Yahr, PQD-39, MMSE, MoCA, HAMA, HAMD and patients' satisfaction between the two groups mentioned above.

primary_outcome.measure: Scores' change of Unified Parkinson's Rating Scale (part III/motor part)
primary_outcome.description: Compares the scores' change of Unified Parkinson's Rating Scale (part III/motor part) between the two groups.

secondary_outcome.description: Compares the change of Levodopa equivalent dose between the two groups.
Compares the rates of adverse events between the two groups.
Compares the dosage of anesthetic between the two groups.
Compares the wake-up time between the two groups.
Compares the surgical time between the two groups.
Compares the Hoehn&Yahr classification between the two groups' patients.

Compares the scores of patients' satisfaction between the two groups' patients by Using a visual analogue scale. The minimum value is 0 and maximum value is 10. Higher value means greater satisfaction.

secondary_outcome.measure: Scores' change of 39-item Parkinson's Disease Questionnaire
secondary_outcome.description: Compares the scores' change of 39-item Parkinson's Disease Questionnaire between the two groups.

secondary_outcome.measure: Scores' change of Mini-mental State Examination
secondary_outcome.description: Compares the scores' change of Mini-mental State Examination between the two groups.

secondary_outcome.measure: Scores' change of Montreal Cognitive Assessment
secondary_outcome.description: Compares the scores' change of Montreal Cognitive Assessment between the two groups.

secondary_outcome.measure: Scores' change of Hamilton Anxiety Scale
secondary_outcome.description: Compares the scores' change of Hamilton Anxiety Scale between the two groups.

secondary_outcome.measure: Scores' change of Hamilton Depression Scale
secondary_outcome.description: Compares the scores' change of Hamilton Depression Scale between the two groups.

arm_group.description: Parkinson's disease patients receiving deep brain stimulation under MAC anesthesia.
Parkinson's disease patients receiving deep brain stimulation under AAA anesthesia.

intervention.description: Patients receives DBS under monitored anesthesia care.
Patients receives DBS under asleep-awake-asleep anesthesia.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age greater than 18 years old
- Diagnosis of primary Parkinson's disease
- Parkinson's disease-related symptoms remain difficult to control with appropriate anti-parkinsonian medications.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Refusal to Participate in the research
- Patients with severe comorbidities such as severe sleep apnea syndrome and metal disorder
- Previous functional neurosurgery: DBS, thalamic incision, etc.

overall_official.affiliation: Anesthesia department of Shenzhen Second People's Hospital
